constituent: dormitory, house, pup tent, large, St. Bernard, sun, day, small, little
koohiiStory1: A dormitory is right in the middle between living in a house and living in a pup tent.
koohiiStory2: This guy would rather use his pup-tent as a house, than sleep in the dormitory. So he effectively turned that pup-tent into a house by getting a postal address for it etc. (just to emphasize house).
